name.description: A name given to the model or data
name.title: Name

source.description: A source from which the model/data is derived
source.title: Source

identifier.description: An unambiguous ID given to the model or data. This can also be created automatically by a software tool
identifier.title: Identifier

author.description: Person(s) who generated the model code or generated the data set originally

items.description: Object defined according to vCard standard 4.0

title.description: Specifies the job title, functional position or function of the individual associated.
title.title: Title

email.description: The address for electronic mail communication.
email.title: Email

telephone.description: The canonical number string for a telephone number for telephony communication.
telephone.title: Telephone

country.description: Full name of the country in English
country.title: Country

gender.description: Sex and gender identity. M (male), F (female), O (other), N (none or not applicable) and U (unknown)
gender.title: Gender

author.title: Author list

creator.description: The person(s) that created this FSK file including all metadata

items.description: Object defined according to vCard standard 4.0

title.description: Specifies the job title, functional position or function of the individual associated.
title.title: Title

email.description: The address for electronic mail communication.
email.title: Email

telephone.description: The canonical number string for a telephone number for telephony communication.
telephone.title: Telephone

country.description: Full name of the country in English
country.title: Country

gender.description: Sex and gender identity. M (male), F (female), O (other), N (none or not applicable) and U (unknown)
gender.title: Gender

creator.title: Creator list

creationDate.description: Creation date/time of the FSK file
creationDate.title: Creation date

modificationDate.description: Date/time of the last version of the FSK file
modificationDate.title: Modification date

rights.description: Rights granted for usage, distribution and modification of this FSK file
rights.title: Rights

availability.description: Availability of data or model, i.e. if the annotated model code / data is included in this FSK file
availability.title: Availability

url.description: Web address referencing the resource location (data for example)
url.title: URL

format.description: File extension of the model or data file (including version number of format if applicable)
format.title: Format

isReferenceDescription.description: Indicates whether this specific publication serves as the reference description for the model. There has to be at least one reference where this field is set to 'True'
isReferenceDescription.title: Is_reference_description?

title.description: Title of publication in which the model or date has been described
title.title: Title

doi.description: The DOI related to this publication
doi.title: Publication DOI

publicationType.description: The type of publication, e.g. Report, Journal article, Book, Online database, ...
publicationType.title: Publication type

date.description: Temporal information on the publication date
date.title: Date

pmid.description: The PubMed ID related to this publication
pmid.title: PubMed ID

authorList.description: Name and surname of the authors who contributed to this publication
authorList.title: Author list

abstract.description: Abstract of the publication in which the model or the data has been described
abstract.title: Abstract

journal.description: Data on the details of the journal in which the model or date has been described
journal.title: Journal

volume.description: Data on the details of the volume in which the model or date has been described
volume.title: Volume

issue.description: Data on the details of the issue in which the model or date has been described
issue.title: Issue

status.description: The status of this publication, e.g. Published, Submitted, etc.
status.title: Status

website.description: A link to the publication website (different from DOI)
website.title: Website

comment.description: Further comments related to the reference description, e.g. which section in there describes the specific model or which figure in there can be reproduced with the visualization script
comment.title: Comment

language.description: A language of the resource (some data or reports can be available in French language for example)
language.title: Language

software.description: The program or software language in which the model has been implemented
software.title: Software

languageWrittenIn.description: Software language used to write the model, e.g. R or MatLab
languageWrittenIn.title: Language written in

modelClass.description: Type of model according to RAKIP classification
modelClass.title: Model class

modelSubClass.description: Sub-classification of the model given the Model Class
modelSubClass.title: Subclass

modelClassComment.description: Comment with further details on the model class
modelClassComment.title: Comment

basicProcess.description: Defines the impact of the process on the hazard (so far only valid for process models and predictive models)
basicProcess.title: Basic process

status.description: The curation status of the model
status.title: Status

objective.description: Objective of the model or data
objective.title: Objective

description.description: General description of the study, data or model
description.title: Description

name.description: The product, matrix or environment (e.g food product, lab media, soil etc.) for which the model or data applies
name.title: Name

description.description: Detailed description of the product, matrix or environment for which the model or data applies
description.title: Description

unit.description: Unit of the product, matrix or environment for which the model or data applies
unit.title: Unit

method.description: Type of production for the product/ matrix
method.title: Method of production

packaging.description: Describe container or wrapper that holds the product/matrix. Common type of packaging (paper or plastic bags, boxes, tinplate or aluminium cans, plastic trays, plastic bottles, glass bottles or jars)
packaging.title: Packaging

treatment.description: Used to characterise a product/matrix based on the treatment or processes applied to the product or any indexed ingredient
treatment.title: Treatment

originCountry.description: Country of origin of the food/product (ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 country code)
originCountry.title: Country of origin

originArea.description: Area of origin of the food/product (Nomenclature of territorial units for statistics – NUTS – coding system valid only for EEA and Switzerland).
originArea.title: Area of origin

fisheriesArea.description: Fisheries or aquaculture area specifying the origin of the sample (FAO Fisheries areas).
fisheriesArea.title: Fisheries area

type.description: General classification of the hazard for which the model or data applies
type.title: Hazard type

name.description: Name of the hazard (agent, contaminant, chemical) for which the data or model applies
name.title: Hazard name

description.description: Description of the hazard for which the model or data applies
description.title: Description

unit.description: Unit of the hazard for which the model or data applies
unit.title: Unit

adverseEffect.description: Adverse effect induced by hazard about morbidity, mortality, and etcetera
adverseEffect.title: Adverse effect

benchmarkDose.description: A dose or concentration that produces a predetermined change in response rate of an adverse effect (called the benchmark response or BMR) compared to background
benchmarkDose.title: Benchmark Dose (BMD)

maximumResidueLimit.description: International regulations and permissible maximum residue levels in food and drinking water
maximumResidueLimit.title: Maximum Residue Limit (MRL)

noObservedAdverseAffectLevel.description: Level of exposure of an organism, found by experiment or observation, at which there is no biologically or statistically significant increase in the frequency or severity of any adverse effects in the exposed population when compared to its appropriate control
noObservedAdverseAffectLevel.title: No Observed Adverse Affect Level (NOAEL)

lowestObservedAdverseAffectLevel.description: Lowest concentration or amount of a substance found by experiment or observation that causes an adverse alteration of morphology, function, capacity, growth, development, or lifespan of a target organism distinguished from normal organisms of the same species under defined conditions of exposure
lowestObservedAdverseAffectLevel.title: Lowest Observed Adverse Effect Level (LOAEL)

acceptableOperatorsExposureLevel.description: Maximum amount of active substance to which the operator may be exposed without any adverse health effects. The AOEL is expressed as milligrams of the chemical per kilogram body weight of the operator
acceptableOperatorsExposureLevel.title: Acceptable Operator Exposure Level (AOEL)

acuteReferenceDose.description: An estimate (with uncertainty spanning perhaps an order of magnitude) of a daily oral exposure for an acute duration (24 hours or less) to the human population (including sensitive subgroups) that is likely to be without an appreciable risk of deleterious effects during a lifetime
acuteReferenceDose.title: Acute Reference Dose (ARfD)

acceptableDailyIntake.description: Measure of amount of a specific substance in food or in drinking water tahta can be ingested (orally) on a daily basis over a lifetime without an appreciable health risk
acceptableDailyIntake.title: Acceptable Daily Intake (ADI)

indSum.description: Define if the parameter reported is an individual residue/analyte, a summed residue definition or part of a sum a summed residue definition
indSum.title: Individual or Summed Hazard

name.description: Name of the population for which the model or data applies
name.title: Population name

targetPopulation.description: Population of individual that we are interested in describing and making statistical inferences about
targetPopulation.title: Target population

populationSpan.description: Temporal information on the exposure duration
populationSpan.title: Population span (years)

populationDescription.description: Description of the population for which the model applies (demographic and socio-economic characteristics for example). Background information that are needed in the data analysis phase, size of household, education level, employment status, professional category, ethnicity, etc.
populationDescription.title: Description

populationAge.description: Description of the range of age or group of age
populationAge.title: Population age

populationGender.description: Description of the percentage of gender
populationGender.title: Population gender

bmi.description: Description of the range of BMI or class of BMI or BMI mean
bmi.title: BMI

specialDietGroups.description: Description of sub-population with special diets (vegetarians, diabetics, group following special ethnic diets)
specialDietGroups.title: Special diet groups

patternConsumption.description: Description of the consumption of different food items, frequency, portion size
patternConsumption.title: Consumption pattern

region.description: Spatial information (area) on which the population group of the model or data applies
region.title: Region

country.description: Country on which the population group of the model or data applies
country.title: Country

populationRiskFactor.description: Population risk factor that may influence the outcomes of the study, confounder should be included
populationRiskFactor.title: Risk and population factors

season.description: Distribution of surveyed people according to the season (influence consumption pattern)
season.title: Season

generalComment.description: General comments on the scope of the study, data or model
generalComment.title: General comment

temporalInformation.description: Temporal information on which the model or data applies / An interval of time that is named or defined by its start and end dates (period of study)
temporalInformation.title: Temporal information

spatialInformation.description: Spatial information (area) on which the model or data applies
spatialInformation.title: Spatial information

identifier.description: A user defined identifier for the study
identifier.title: Study identifier

description.description: A brief description of the study aims
description.title: Study description

designType.description: The type of study design being employed
designType.title: Design type

assayMeasurementType.description: The measurement being observed in this assay
assayMeasurementType.title: Assay measurement type

assayTechnologyType.description: The technology being employed to observe this measurement
assayTechnologyType.title: Assay technology type

accreditationProcedureForTheAssayTechnol.description: Accreditation procedure for the analytical method used
accreditationProcedureForTheAssayTechnol.title: Accreditation procedure for assay

protocolName.description: The name of the protocol, e.g.Extraction Protocol
protocolName.title: Protocol name

protocolType.description: The type of the protocol, preferably coming from an Ontology, e.g. Extraction Protocol
protocolType.title: Protocol type

protocolURI.description: A URI to link out to a publication, web page, etc. describing the protocol
protocolURI.title: Protocol URI

protocolVersion.description: The version of the protocol used, where applicable.
protocolVersion.title: Protocol version

protocolParametersName.description: The parameters used when executing this protocol
protocolParametersName.title: Parameters names

protocolComponentsName.description: The names of the components used when carrying out this protocol
protocolComponentsName.title: Components names

sampleName.description: An unambiguous ID given to the samples used in the assay
sampleName.title: Name

protocolOfSampleCollection.description: Additional protocol for sample and sample collection. Corresponds to the Protocol REF in ISA
protocolOfSampleCollection.title: Protocol of sample collection

samplingStrategy.description: Sampling strategy (ref. EUROSTAT - Typology of sampling strategy, version of July 2009)
samplingStrategy.title: Sampling strategy

typeOfSamplingProgram.description: Indicate the type of programm for which the samples have been collected
typeOfSamplingProgram.title: Type of sampling program

samplingMethod.description: Sampling method used to take the sample
samplingMethod.title: Sampling method

samplingPlan.description: Description of data collection technique: stratified or complex sampling (several stages)
samplingPlan.title: Sampling plan

samplingWeight.description: Description of the method employed to compute sampling weight (nonresponse-adjusted weight)
samplingWeight.title: Sampling weight

samplingSize.description: Number of units, full participants, partial participants, eligibles, not eligible, unresolved (eligibility status not resolved)
samplingSize.title: Sampling size

lotSizeUnit.description: Unit in which the lot size is expressed
lotSizeUnit.title: Lot size unit

samplingPoint.description: Point in the food chain where the sample was taken. (Doc. ESTAT/F5/ES/155 “Data dictionary of activities of the establishments”)
samplingPoint.title: Sampling point

collectionTool.description: Food diaries, interview, 24-hour recall interview, food propensy questionnaire, portion size measurement aids, eating outside questionnaire
collectionTool.title: Methodological tool to collect data

softwareTool.description: Name of the software used to collect the data
softwareTool.title: Dietary software tool

recordTypes.description: Consumption occasion, mean of consumption, quantified and described as eaten, recipes for self-made
recordTypes.title: Type of records

name.description: Laboratory code (National laboratory code if available) or Laboratory name
name.title: Laboratory name

country.description: Country where the laboratory is placed. (ISO 3166-1-alpha-2)
country.title: Laboratory country

name.description: A name given to the assay
name.title: Assay name

description.description: General description of the assay. Corresponds to the Protocol REF in ISA
description.title: Description

moisturePercentage.description: Percentage of moisture in the original sample
moisturePercentage.title: Percentage of moisture

fatPercentage.description: Percentage of fat in the original sample
fatPercentage.title: Percentage of fat

detectionLimit.description: Limit of detection reported in the unit specified by the variable Hazard unit
detectionLimit.title: Limit of detection

quantificationLimit.description: Limit of quantification reported in the unit specified by the variable Hazard unit
quantificationLimit.title: Limit of quantification

leftCensoredData.description: Percentage of measures equal to LOQ and/or LOD
leftCensoredData.title: Left-censored data

contaminationRange.description: Range of result of the analytical measure reported in the unit specified by the variable Hazard unit
contaminationRange.title: Range of contamination

uncertaintyValue.description: Indicate the expanded uncertainty (usually 95% confidence interval) value associated with the measurement expressed in the unit reported in the field Hazard unit
uncertaintyValue.title: Uncertainty value

id.description: An unambiguous ID given to each of the parameters - preferably autogenerated by a software tool and compatible with SBML ID requirements, only letters from A to Z, numbers and '_'
id.title: Parameter ID

classification.description: General classification of the parameter (e.g. Input, Constant, Output etc)
classification.title: Parameter classification

name.description: A name given to the parameter
name.title: Parameter name

unitCategory.description: General classification of the parameter unit
unitCategory.title: Unit category

dataType.description: Information on the data format of the parameter, e.g. if it is a categorical variable: int, double, array of size x,y,z
dataType.title: Data type

source.description: Information on the type of knowledge used to define the parameter value
source.title: Parameter source

subject.description: Scope of the parameter, e.g. if it refers to an animal, a batch of animals, a batch of products, a carcass, a carcass skin etc
subject.title: Parameter subject

distribution.description: Distribution describing the parameter variabilty. If no distribution selected this means the value provided in 'Parameter value' is a point estimate. In case a distribution is selected the value provided in 'Parameter value' is a string that the model code can parse in order to sample from the named distribution
distribution.title: Parameter distribution

value.description: A default value for the parameter. This is mandatory (needs to be provided) for all parameters of type 'Input'
value.title: Value

isReferenceDescription.description: Indicates whether this specific publication serves as the reference description for the model. There has to be at least one reference where this field is set to 'True'
isReferenceDescription.title: Is_reference_description?

title.description: Title of publication in which the model or date has been described
title.title: Title

doi.description: The DOI related to this publication
doi.title: Publication DOI

publicationType.description: The type of publication, e.g. Report, Journal article, Book, Online database, ...
publicationType.title: Publication type

date.description: Temporal information on the publication date
date.title: Date

pmid.description: The PubMed ID related to this publication
pmid.title: PubMed ID

authorList.description: Name and surname of the authors who contributed to this publication
authorList.title: Author list

abstract.description: Abstract of the publication in which the model or the data has been described
abstract.title: Abstract

journal.description: Data on the details of the journal in which the model or date has been described
journal.title: Journal

volume.description: Data on the details of the volume in which the model or date has been described
volume.title: Volume

issue.description: Data on the details of the issue in which the model or date has been described
issue.title: Issue

status.description: The status of this publication, e.g. Published, Submitted, etc.
status.title: Status

website.description: A link to the publication website (different from DOI)
website.title: Website

comment.description: Further comments related to the reference description, e.g. which section in there describes the specific model or which figure in there can be reproduced with the visualization script
comment.title: Comment

variabilitySubject.description: Information on which the variability is described. It can be variability between broiler in a flock, variability between all meat packages sold in Denmark, variability between days, etc.
variabilitySubject.title: Parameter variability subject

minValue.description: Numerical value of the minimum limit of the parameter that determines the range of applicability for which the model applies
minValue.title: Value min

maxValue.description: Numerical value of the maximum limit of the parameter that determines the range of applicability for which the model applies
maxValue.title: Value max

sse.description: Statistical values calculated to describe the performance of the model fitting procedure
sse.title: SSE

mse.description: Statistical values calculated to describe the performance of the model fitting procedure
mse.title: MSE

rmse.description: Statistical values calculated to describe the performance of the model fitting procedure
rmse.title: RMSE

rsquared.description: Statistical values calculated to describe the performance of the model fitting procedure
rsquared.title: R squared

aic.description: Statistical values calculated to describe the performance of the model fitting procedure
aic.title: AIC

bic.description: Statistical values calculated to describe the performance of the model fitting procedure
bic.title: BIC

sensitivityAnalysis.description: Description of the results of an sensitivity analysis, i.e. how independence assumptions are met or how variables will affect the output of model
sensitivityAnalysis.title: Sensitivity analysis

name.description: A name given to the model equation
name.title: Model equation name

modelEquationClass.description: Information on that helps to categorize model equations
modelEquationClass.title: Model equation class

reference.description: Information on the source, where the equation has been extracted from - if available

isReferenceDescription.description: Indicates whether this specific publication serves as the reference description for the model. There has to be at least one reference where this field is set to 'True'
isReferenceDescription.title: Is_reference_description?

title.description: Title of publication in which the model or date has been described
title.title: Title

doi.description: The DOI related to this publication
doi.title: Publication DOI

publicationType.description: The type of publication, e.g. Report, Journal article, Book, Online database, ...
publicationType.title: Publication type

date.description: Temporal information on the publication date
date.title: Date

pmid.description: The PubMed ID related to this publication
pmid.title: PubMed ID

authorList.description: Name and surname of the authors who contributed to this publication
authorList.title: Author list

abstract.description: Abstract of the publication in which the model or the data has been described
abstract.title: Abstract

journal.description: Data on the details of the journal in which the model or date has been described
journal.title: Journal

volume.description: Data on the details of the volume in which the model or date has been described
volume.title: Volume

issue.description: Data on the details of the issue in which the model or date has been described
issue.title: Issue

status.description: The status of this publication, e.g. Published, Submitted, etc.
status.title: Status

website.description: A link to the publication website (different from DOI)
website.title: Website

comment.description: Further comments related to the reference description, e.g. which section in there describes the specific model or which figure in there can be reproduced with the visualization script
comment.title: Comment

reference.title: Model equation reference

modelEquation.description: The pointer to the file that holds the software code (e.g. R-script)
modelEquation.title: Equation

modelHypothesis.description: Description of the hypothesis of the model
modelHypothesis.title: Hypothesis of the model

fittingProcedure.description: Procedure used to fit the data to the model equation
fittingProcedure.title: Fitting procedure

treatment.description: Description of the mathematical method to replace left-censored data (recommandation of WHO (2013), distribution or others)
treatment.title: Left-censored data treatment

contamination.description: Description of the range of of the level of contamination after left censored data treatment
contamination.title: Contam level post data treatment

type.description: Description of the type of exposure
type.title: Type of exposure

scenario.description: Description of the different scenarios of exposure assessment
scenario.title: Scenario

title: Generic Model-Metadata-Schema
description: JSON Schema for Generic Model Metadata 1.04
